str2: Then, therefore, since. Probably from airo; a particle denoting an inference more or less decisive.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From keimai; to put to sleep, i.e. to slumber; figuratively, to decease.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
